MParmorLibrary.ModuleDef.label: heavy duty battery
MParmorLibrary.ModuleDef.description: This module triples the mechframe's internal battery capacity.

MParmorLibrary.ModuleDef.label: field supply module
MParmorLibrary.ModuleDef.description: This module consumes field supply ration to replenish pilot's food and rest needs in action. Does not fully replace actual bed rests as side effects may follow.

MParmorLibrary.ModuleDef.label: solar panel module
MParmorLibrary.ModuleDef.description: An array of photoelectric cells charges the mechframe using solar power when inactive.

MParmorLibrary.ModuleDef.label: combat recreation module
MParmorLibrary.ModuleDef.description: Armed with softened sofa and on-board recreation system, this module provides a comfortable cockpit enviroment and electronic entertainments, a luxury in battlefields.
